vlive.korean: [현재 회심의 일격!] [Hyunjae's fatal blow!] View video PeekaVoo! : [THE100] 덥즈가 자유시간을 즐기는 방법!2 - EP 11
결국 생각해 낸게 일격 필살기야? In the end, it's the final blow to you? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.130 2018 SBS 가요대전
vlive.english: In the end, it's the final blow to you?

vlive.korean: 마지막에 그냥 - 약간 일격 필살기 같은 거죠 아닌가? At the end, just... - It's kind of like the final blow. Isn't it? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.130 2018 SBS 가요대전
vlive.english: At the end, just... - It's kind of like the final blow. Isn't it?

vlive.korean: [회심의 일격] 진짜 후회하지 마. [A huge grin] Please don't regret it~ 듣기 View video Amigo TV : 본격 아이돌 혜자방송 <아이돌에 미치고, 아미고TV> 빅스 편(2/7)
vlive.english: [A huge grin] Please don't regret it~

vlive.korean: 기왕 하는 거면 신나게 하는 마음에 제가 일격을 가했죠. So, I said, "If you have to do it, enjoy it." 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Man's Avenue - 맨스에비뉴 '신곡 스포! 맨스라디오'
vlive.english: So, I said, "If you have to do it, enjoy it."

examples.korean: He felled his opponent with a single blow. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 단 일격에 상대방을 때려눕혔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He felled his opponent with a single blow. Add to Wordbook

examples.english: He raised his arm to try to deflect the blow. Add to Wordbook
